tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE forensic_analysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  fingerprint_id UUID NOT NULL,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    metadata_key VARCHAR(50),
    metadata_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES fingerprint_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE forensic_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    results_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES fingerprint_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ForensicAnalysis (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 fingerprint_id INT,
 analysis_result TEXT,
 analyzed_by VARCHAR(50),
 analysis_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FingerprintImages (
  image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  captured_by_user VARCHAR(50),
  image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE FingerprintMetadata (
  metadata_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id UUID NOT NULL,
  fingerprint_quality VARCHAR(10),
  minutiae_count INT,
  ridge_direction VARCHAR(50),
  ridge_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE ForensicAnalysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id UUID NOT NULL,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
  examiner_name VARCHAR(100),
  analysis_result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ImageTags (
  tag_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id UUID NOT NULL,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
